pragma solidity ^0.8.7;

import "@openzeppelin/contracts@4.5.0/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol";
// ERC20 formatýnda coini solidity uzantýsýyla ekledik.

import "@openzeppelin/contracts@4.5.0/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Burnable.sol";
// Coinin arzý Vodafone'un isteði doðrultusunda azaltýlabilir olduðunu belirttik.

import "@openzeppelin/contracts@4.5.0/access/Ownable.sol";
// Coinin arzý Vodafone'un isteði doðrultusunda arttýrýlabilir olduðunu belirttik.

import "@openzeppelin/contracts@4.5.0/token/ERC20/extensions/draft-ERC20Permit.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts@4.5.0/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Votes.sol";
// Coin Vodafone'un isteði doðrultusunda oylamalarda kullanýlabilir olduðunu belirttik.


/// @custom:güvenlik ve iletiþim için 10lardanur@gmail.com   05352541520


contract VodafoneCoin is ERC20, ERC20Burnable, Ownable, ERC20Permit, ERC20Votes {
    constructor() ERC20("VodafoneCoin", "VDFN") ERC20Permit("VodafoneCoin") {
        _mint(msg.sender, 1000000 * 10 ** decimals());
    }
// ERC20 standardýnda yaratýlan VodafoneCoin, sembolü VDFN'dir.
    function mint(address to, uint256 amount) public onlyOwner {
        _mint(to, amount);
    }
// Coinin yaratýlma aþamasý 
    function _afterTokenTransfer(address from, address to, uint256 amount)
        internal
        override(ERC20, ERC20Votes)
    {
        super._afterTokenTransfer(from, to, amount);
    }
// Coinin oylamalarda kullanýlýrken geçtiði transfer aþamasý
    function _mint(address to, uint256 amount)
        internal
        override(ERC20, ERC20Votes)
    {
        super._mint(to, amount);
    }

// Coinin arz artma prensibi

    function _burn(address account, uint256 amount)
        internal
        override(ERC20, ERC20Votes)
    {
        super._burn(account, amount);
    }
}
